# Agent Army

> Deploy and manage autonomous AI coding agents on your own cloud infrastructure.

Agent Army is an open-source CLI tool that provisions, orchestrates, and monitors AI dev teams. Deploy AI coding agents (Claude, GPT, etc.) to your own AWS infrastructure with a single command.

## Key Features

- One-command deployment of AI coding agents to your cloud
- Support for multiple agent types: Juno (Claude Code), Titus (Aider), Scout (Codex)
- Built-in integrations with Linear, GitHub, and Slack
- Secure cloud infrastructure provisioned via Pulumi (VPC, EC2, networking)
- Real-time agent monitoring and SSH access
- Cost estimation and resource management
